channel.title: What should I do?
channel.description:
I just got some of my money back from an old account, how should I use it? I currently have 12m, but I'm not so good with deciding what to do with money.
1. I don't gamble anymore 2. I will skill as long as I can make money

item.title: What should I do?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

There have been numerous topics cover on how to make money on this forum, I suggest using the search feature. Really, the only way your going to start making money on Runescape is to play the game. You will gain cash with more experience you have, and learn techniques that can gain money faster than the most known ones. I am locking this topic as it’s been answered on how to make money.

Read full topic

item.title: What should I do?
item.dc:creator: @Squirt_Ltd Squirt Ltd
item.description:
@Squirt_Ltd wrote:

there are lots of ways to make money, it mostly depends on your stats tough

RuneScape Wiki

Money making guide

This article provides players with a list of ways to make money in RuneScape, along with the requirements, estimated profit per hour, and a guide explaining each method in detail. The list is separated into hourly methods, which can be done more or...

merching is always an option too but in my opionion it isn’t very fun

Read full topic
